Description.Text: Renion Hotel Almaty is a friendly 3-star boutique hotel offering spacious accommodation near the heart of Almaty. Highlights include an indoor swimming pool, Jacuzzi, sauna, free Wi-Fi and parking. Almaty is a major financial and cultural centre of Central Asia and is surrounded by snow-capped mountains. Nearby places of interest include the Military History Museum, Panfilov Park and Zenkov's Cathedral. Almaty 1 train station provides fast and easy access to other popular Almaty destinations. The hotel occupies a modern mid-rise property with a glass facade. Facilities include an indoor swimming pool, Jacuzzi, sauna and gym. A range of massages are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are spacious and decorated in a bright, classic style with dark wood furniture. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. Cafe Booblik offers American, Russian and Oriental dishes in a stylish setting, while guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception service and offers a chargeable airport shuttle service.
